SEARCH
Package model

Class MedicationBank

java.lang.Object
model.MedicationBank
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class MedicationBank extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a medication inventory system. Provides functionalities to manage medications, including adding, updating stock levels, viewing inventory, and loading data from a CSV file. Handles low-stock alerts and allows for copying inventory from another MedicationBank
Since:
2024-11-18
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lee Kuan Rong Shane, Lim Wee Keat, Tan Wen Rong, Yeoh Kai Wen
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • MedicationBank

      public MedicationBank()
      Constructs an empty MedicationBank. Initializes an empty medication inventory.

  • Method Details

    • initialiseMedicineBank

      public void initialiseMedicineBank()
      Initializes the medication bank by loading medications from a CSV file.

    • copyFrom

      public void copyFrom(MedicationBank otherBank)
      Copies the inventory from another MedicationBank. Clears the current inventory before copying. Used for loading from Serialized file
      Parameters:
      otherBank - The MedicationBank to copy inventory from.

    • loadMedicationsFromCSV

      private void loadMedicationsFromCSV(String filePath) throws IOException
      Loads medications from a CSV file into the inventory.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the CSV file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while reading the file.

    • addMedication

      public void addMedication(Medication medication)
      Adds a medication to the inventory.
      Parameters:
      medication - The Medication object to add.

    • increaseStock

      public void increaseStock(String medicationName, int amount)
      Increases the stock of a specific medication.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - The name of the medication.
      amount - The amount to increase.

    • decreaseStock

      public void decreaseStock(String medicationName, int amount)
      Decreases the stock of a specific medication.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - The name of the medication.
      amount - The amount to decrease.

    • checkStock

      public int checkStock(String medicationName)
      Checks the stock level of a specific medication.
      Parameters:
      medicationName - The name of the medication.
      Returns:
      The stock level of the medication, or 0 if the medication is not found.

    • viewInventory

      public void viewInventory()
      Displays the entire medication inventory.

    • checkAndAlertForLowStock

      private void checkAndAlertForLowStock(Medication medication)
      Checks if the stock level of a medication is below its threshold and triggers an alert if true.
      Parameters:
      medication - The Medication object to check.
